name: Behir Magus
movement: walk 60 ft., climb 40 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: The Behir Magus is a Huge monstrosity characterized by its serpentine body covered in scaly skin and its long, sinuous form. It possesses a fierce bite and a constricting attack, making it a daunting presence in combat. Its connection to lightning is visually striking, as it channels powerful electrical energy.
memorable: Its ability to absorb lightning damage and retaliate empowers it against spellcasters who rely on electrical attacks, making it a unique threat in battle.
goals: To dominate its territory and eliminate threats, utilizing its agility and powerful attacks to overpower foes.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other creatures associated with lightning or draconic lineage.
environment: Typically found in caves, mountains, or areas with access to water where it can leverage its agility and mobility.
strengths: High Constitution and dexterous movements allow it to withstand damage and evade many attacks. Its immunity to lightning grants it resilience against elemental magic.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on its breath weapon and may struggle against foes resistant to physical attacks.
attacks: Delivers a powerful bite that can incapacitate foes and a constricting attack that grapples and restrains enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Breath allows it to unleash a devastating line of lightning that can severely damage multiple creatures.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 90 feet, enabling it to perceive its surroundings without reliance on sight.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Stealth, and Perception, showcasing its physical prowess and keen awareness.
additional_information: Can climb on difficult surfaces and ceilings with Spider Climb.
Utilizes Lightning Breath reactively when attacked, dealing damage to the aggressor.
Can become invisible in response to damage, enhancing its survivability.
Absorbs lightning attacks and retaliates with necrotic damage.
Capable of grappling two creatures simultaneously.
